node.display_long_description:
"Vanishing Grace" is a narrative puzzle game set in a near-future where a solar storm has changed life on Earth.

You play as Joel, a civil servant who has a quiet life until one day he discovers that Grace, his childhood friend, has disappeared.
Her craft has reached the Citadel unmanned. It's at this point that Joel decides to leave everything behind to find her.
Pilot Grace's craft and travel around desolate wastelands while you discover the story behind her mysterious disappearance.

•Face the challenge of piloting Grace's craft and ascertaining her whereabouts.
•Use a futuristic boomerang to collect the craft’s energy from stones that float in the environment.
•Repair the craft through fun puzzles.
•Discover a deep story about the sacrifices we have to make to find our place in the world.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
1.02 PATCH NOTES
General updates

- We added Smooth Turn
- We added more options to the menu before entering the game
- We added a circle on the floor to let the players know if they leave the center of the play area in joystick mode
- We added an SFX that allows the players to know when they can't enter the craft
- We added a sign, so the Gas Station puzzle is easier to understand

Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that may prevent the Solar Sail crank from moving
- Fixed a bug that may prevent some players from entering the craft in the first chapter
- Fixed a bug that may prevent the cassette tapes from reproducing properly
- Fixed a bug that may change the players' height

nodes.title: Update 1.02 is now available!
nodes.body_text:
Hello everyone!! First of all, we wanted to thank you for your support!

We've heard all your feedback, and we take note of it. So we release our first update, which includes improvements and some bug fixes.

1.02 PATCH NOTES

General updates

- We added Smooth Turn
- We added more options to the menu before entering the game
- We added a circle on the floor to let the players know if they leave the center of the play area in joystick mode
- We added an SFX that allows the players to know when they can't enter the craft
- We added a sign, so the Gas Station puzzle is easier to understand

Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that may prevent the Solar Sail crank from moving
- Fixed a bug that may prevent some players from entering the craft in the first chapter
- Fixed a bug that may prevent the cassette tapes from reproducing properly
- Fixed a bug that may change the players' height

node.reviewDescription:
First let me say that if you are not a fan of narrative story driven games than you probably won't be interested. It is a puzzle game yes but far more than that it is a story. As a lover of story based games and games that leave me thinking about the events after the game is over I love this game. It is exactly what I look for in a narrative game. Excellent voice acting, engaging story, lots of interesting extra story bits to discover, and just an overall pleasant experience. 

A couple of the puzzles had me stumped for a bit but in the end this is one of my favorite narrative games I've played in a while and definitely my favorite narative Quest game.
node.reviewTitle: An Emotional And Amazing Narrative Adven

developerResponse.body: We're delighted that you enjoyed the story. We put a lot of effort into it since there aren't many games on VR focused on that. It makes us very happy to read comments like yours.

website_page_meta.description: "Vanishing Grace" is a narrative puzzle game set in a near-future where a solar storm has changed life on Earth.
